name: Tirawa
description:
In an age where warping time is a standard technology used by police forces,  those on the run can't just race away - to not be broken by their warped time, they must stay close to their enemies!

Time gradually speeds up. Go closer to blue enemy cars to slow down. Try not to crash for as long as possible!

ok WebGL doesn't work :(

A simple prototype made in 4-ish hours for a course on my uni, quality very much not guaranteed

Features assets from Perfect Games' Arcade Car Controller (Lite version) and Triangularity's Colorful City
